item.description:
This Valentine's weekend, NetSAP Boston invites couples and singles to its most fun and best theme party - The Hollywood Bollywood Party.

Dress up as your favorite Hollywood or Bollywood movie star, and enjoy a night of music and dancing. You can come dressed as Mr and Mrs Smith, Surinder Sahni (Shah Rukh Khan in Rab Ne Bana Di Jodi), the three idiots, Geet (Jab We Met) and the list goes on. This will be a super fun party you will not want to miss.

This is a private event and we have the Back Lounge at CURE reserved. Cure is Boston's coolest new lounge. DJ Bombay, one of the best Indian DJs will play the hottest Hollywood Bollywood numbers that will keep you dancing. And we will have raffles to raise money for children.

NetSAP Members: Free (registration required)

Non-Members: $20 (Early Bird special $15 until Jan 31).

Register here: http://www.membership.netip.org/assnfe/ev.asp?ID=206

Become a NetSAP member here ($45 singles, $75 couples): http://na.netip.org/members/join
item.name: NetSAP Boston's Hollywood Bollywood Theme Party!
